about.title: About JVC India
about.description: Founded in 2008 and headquartered in Aluva, Kerala, JVC India has established a strong reputation as a trusted exporter of quality Indian products. The company specializes in trading and exporting natural minerals, ores, and cement admixtures, along with chemical fertilizers, fly ash powder, garnet abrasives, quartz crystals, and other processed minerals — delivering consistent quality, reliability, and value to customers worldwide.

cards.label: OUR MISSION
cards.heading: Delivering Reliable Mineral Supply
cards.content: Our mission is to supply export-grade industrial minerals that meet international specifications while ensuring dependable sourcing, consistent quality, and efficient logistics for our customers worldwide.

cards.label: OUR VALUES
cards.heading: Integrity, Quality & Partnership
cards.content: We operate with transparency, ethical sourcing practices, and a strong commitment to quality. Our focus is on building long-term relationships through reliability, accountability, and continuous improvement.

services.title: Global Supply
services.description: Export of premium minerals, ores, and cement admixtures from trusted Indian sources.

services.title: Custom Packing & Branding
services.description: Tailored packaging solutions and private labeling as per client or market requirements.

services.title: Export & Logistics Support
services.description: Reliable shipping and documentation for smooth global trade.

contact.title: Contact JVC India
contact.description: Reach out for export enquiries, product specifications, or long-term supply partnerships.

info.heading: Export Enquiries & Partnerships
info.text: We work with global buyers across construction, oil & gas, cement, ceramics, and industrial manufacturing sectors.
